GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Update BBIS Source Codes Global Change
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Assigns the provided values to the revenue with the listed source codes
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_DRTV_SOURCECODES ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @SOURCECODES xml, @REVENUESELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @SC_COUNT integer declare @REVENUEID uniqueidentifier declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @REVENUESELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @REVENUESELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@REVENUESELECTIONID)
declare @SCTEMP table ( PageID int, SourceCode nvarchar(30) )
declare @handle int exec sp_xml_preparedocument @handle output, @SOURCECODES
insert into @SCTEMP select PageID, SourceCode from openxml(@handle, '/SOURCECODES/ITEM') with ( PAGEID int 'PAGEID', SOURCECODE nvarchar(30) 'SOURCECODE' )
/* --hard code because xml fields aren't inserting correctly. Ran with 1 record successfully 1 time since upgrade to 3.0 insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (612,'DME13D01234AA') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (629,'DME13D01234AB') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (631,'DME13D01234AD') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (630,'DME13D01234AC') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (716,'EEJ13AA000BB1') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (718,'EEJ13AA000BB1') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (721,'EEMYY00K00000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (727,'EEMYY00K00000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (729,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (728,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (731,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (733,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (734,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (737,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (738,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (739,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (740,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (741,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (725,'EEMYY00K00000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (744,'EEM13DS0000A1') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (724,'EEM13DS0000A3') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (748,'EEM13DA0000A1') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (749,'EEM13DA0000A2') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (750,'EEM13DA0000A3') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (752,'EEM13DA0000A4') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (754,'EEM13DA0000A4') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (755,'EEM13DA0000A4') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (756,'EEM13DA0000A4') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (757,'EEM13DA0000A4') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (762,'MNE14E05840CS.') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (743,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (732,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (763,'MND14E0495000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (736,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (735,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (730,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (745,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (751,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (759,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (742,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (697,'DE014M20000B3') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (698,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (702,'VNM13E100000') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (711,'EEJ13AA000BB1') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (782,'DME13D01234AD') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (783,'DME13D01234AD') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (795,'DMK14D01111BC') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (796,'DMK14D01111BA') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (797,'DMK14D01111BA') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (798,'DMK14D01111BA') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (799,'DMK14D01111BB') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (800,'DMK14D01111BC') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (801,'DMK14D01111BC') insert into @SCTEMP (PageID,SourceCode) values (802,'DMK14D01111BD') */
--set @SC_COUNT = (select count(*) from @SCTEMP where pageid is not null and sourcecode is not null)
-----------------------------------
update REVENUE set SOURCECODE = (select S.SOURCECODE FROM REVENUEBBNC RW join @SCTEMP S on RW.NETCOMMUNITYPAGEID = S.PAGEID where RW.ID = REVENUE.ID) where ID in (select ID from @REVENUESELECTION)
set @NUMBEREDITED=@@ROWCOUNT
--set @NUMBEREDITED=@SC_COUNT -----------------------------------
----------------------------- /* declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), REVENUEID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1
insert into @T select ID from @REVENUESELECTION
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin
select @REVENUEID = REVENUEID from @T where PK = @I
--begin try --update REVENUE --set SOURCECODE = -- (select S.SOURCECODE FROM REVENUEBBNC RW -- inner join @SCTEMP S on RW.NETCOMMUNITYPAGEID = S.PAGEID -- inner join REVENUE on RW.ID = REVENUE.ID -- where revenue.id=@REVENUEID) --where --ID = @REVENUEID --set @NUMBEREDITED=@NUMBEREDITED + @@ROWCOUNT --set @NUMBEREDITED=@SC_COUNT --end try --begin catch --set @NUMBEREDITED=@NUMBEREDITED --set @NUMBEREDITED=@SC_COUNT --end catch
set @I = @I + 1 end */ --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE ----------------------------------------
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
